  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<RestaurantDTO> findAll()
      Gets all the restaurants from the database
      Returns:
      a list of RestaurantDTO objects to be sent to the frontend

    • findById

      public Optional<Restaurant> findById(Integer id)
      Gets the restaurant with the specified id
      Parameters:
      id - the id that I want the restaurant being sought to have
      Returns:
      either an object of the Restaurant class, or null in case the restaurant with the specified id does not exist in the database

    • findByName

      public Optional<Restaurant> findByName(String name)
      Gets the restaurant with the specified name
      Parameters:
      name - the name that I want the restaurant being sought to have
      Returns:
      either an object of the Restaurant class, or null in case the restaurant with the specified name does not exist in the database

    • findByAdmin

      public String findByAdmin(String adminString)
      Gets the restaurant administrated by the specified user
      Parameters:
      adminString - the name that I want the admin of the restaurant being sought to have
      Returns:
      a string which represents either the name of the found restaurant or the empty string in case there is not found a restaurant in the database associated to the specified name

    • findMenuByAdmin

      public String findMenuByAdmin(String adminString)
      Gets the menu which is indirectly associated to the specified admin
      Parameters:
      adminString - the name that I want the admin of the restaurant with the menu being sought to have
      Returns:
      a string which represents either the id of the found menu or the empty string in case there is not found a menu in the database associated to the specified name

    • findMenuByRestaurant

      public String findMenuByRestaurant(String name)
      Gets the menu associated to the specified restaurant
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the restaurant associated to the menu being sought
      Returns:
      a string which is empty in case no menu was found and the id of the menu otherwise

    • generatePdf

      public Boolean generatePdf(String menu) throws IOException
      Generates a PDF with the menu of the restaurant administrated by the admin who is currently logged in
      Parameters:
      menu - the id of the menu which has to be exported as PDF
      Returns:
      a boolean which is always true, showing that the PDF was successfully generated
      Throws:
      IOException - throws an exception in case it appears an error when trying to create the PDF file

    • createRestaurant

      public Boolean createRestaurant(RestaurantDTO restaurantDTO)
      Inserts the restaurant into the database
      Parameters:
      restaurantDTO - the DTO object received from th frontend
      Returns:
      a boolean which is true if the data was successfully saved into the database and false otherwise
